2025-01-15期



东南亚服冒险岛公告


[Completed] Server Check and Cash Shop Update on 15th January 2025


14 Jan 2025

[Completed] Server Check and Cash Shop Update on 15th January 2025


Dear Maplers,

Please be informed that there will be a scheduled maintenance on 15th January 2025.
During this period, services undergoing maintenance will be temporarily unavailable.

Update 1421hrs: Game services for Cassiopeia's World Channels 9 & 10 has resumed.
Update 1128hrs: All game services have resumed, except Cassiopeia's World Channels 9 & 10. Updates will be provided via in-game notice when it has resumed.

Game Maintenance
  • Maintenance Period: 15th January 2025, 0900hrs ~ 1128hrs 1200hrs (GMT+8)
  • Affected Service(s): MapleStorySEA game servers
  • Impact: All MapleStorySEA game servers will be unavailable
    •   ↪ Game services for all worlds will not be available during the stipulated time. Kindly log out before this period to avoid disruptions to your gameplay.

    Update Preview
  • Cash Shop Update details for 15th January 2025 can be found here.

    • Known Issues
  • List of known issues, issues scheduled to be fixed and fixed issues can be found here.

    • Thank you.

    - MapleSEA Administrator
     

    v238 Known Issues and Fixed Issues (Updated 15th January, 1213hrs)


    19 Dec 2024

    v238 Known Issues and Fixed Issues (Updated 15th January, 1213hrs)



    Dear Maplers,
    Please refer to the update notice for information regarding each patch's issues and updates.

    Last Update: 15th January 2025, 1213hrs

    Thank you to Maplers who reported issue(s) listed below.

    Current Known Issues


  • An issue where Black Armor Piece's tooltip contains text error is being investigated.
  • An issue where various Extreme Potion's tooltip contain incorrect information is being investigated.
  • An issue where item name of weapons obtained from Balrog is abnormal is being investigated.
  • An issue where Piping Hot Dumplings chair is partially blocking the character IGN is being investigated.
  • An issue when new monster has been added to the Monster Collection, the sentence appears in the chatbox sounds unnatural is being investigated.
  • An issue where Overload Mana would automatically canceled when Kanna's Spiritial Energy fully depleted is being investigated.
  • An issue where [Princess Nou] Returned From Deadly Fight achievement icon appears incorrect is being investigated.
  • An issue where La La La Megaphone appears awkward when viewed in Character Info is being investigated.
  • An issue where Black Resurrection Flame cannot be used on equipped Tyrant Hyades Belt is being investigated.
  • An issue when performing search for cube related items in Maple Auction does not return any result is being investigated.



    • Resolved Issues


    15th January 2025 Maintenance


  • Fixed an issue where Mu Lung Dojo floor data appears to be overlapped in Character Info.
  • Fixed an issue where Mannequin Stage and Mannequin appear awkward in My Home.
  • Fixed an issue where monster name of Star Force Grape Flavor Jelly Juice, Green Notebook, Yellow Headset, Wild Cosmetics and Picky Curler is abnormal.

    • 8th January 2025 Maintenance


  • Fixed an issue where text appear cut off in Maple Points input field of New Name Auction Sell IGN function.
  • Fixed an issue where New Name Auction Cautionary Notes contains duplicated sentence.
  • Fixed an issue where certain mineral ores item name and tooltip contain inconsistency.
  • Fixed an issue where Champion Burning related unclaimed reward appears in disconnect UI even though Champion Burning is not started.
  • Fixed an issue where certain checklist in CHASER Special Investigation - New Year of Blue Snake behave abnormally.
  • Fixed an issue where Tirnog Hashtag's event period is incorrect in Event List.
  • Fixed an issue where Kelly and Eileen & Kapdi checklist give incorrect amount of CHASER Investigation Progress.
  • Fixed an issue where Recording Pets' equipment purchased on 1st January 2025 does not have any upgrade slots.

    • 5th January 2025


  • Fixed an issue where Heretic Hilla related checklist in CHASER Special Investigation cannot be progressed if Heretic Hilla is defeated in a party.
    •  ↪ The correct parameter for the checklist is defeat Heretic Hilla in solo party. The checklist has been updated to display accurate requirement.

    2nd January 2025 Maintenance


  • Fixed an issue where Gatekeeper Kalos related checklist in CHASER Special Investigation cannot be progressed if Gatekeeper Kalos is defeated in a party.
  • Fixed an issue where Cernium related checklist in CHASER Special Investigation cannot be progressed by newly created Eunwol/Aran character.
  • Fixed an issue where Hard Limbo first clear reward cannot be received if one of the party member has previously cleared Hard Limbo.
    •  ↪ Affected Maplers will be able to receive the first clear reward.

    20th December 2024 Minor Patch


  • Fixed an where Breath of Divinity's Dawn Shield sometimes cannot be casted after the cooldown has ended.
  • Fixed an where certain texts in My Home Christmas related quests contain text error.
  • Fixed an when [Daily Quest] Erda's Request is selected in Maple Scheduler, complete all function cannot be used.
  • Fixed an where [My Home] Let's decorate a beautiful Christmas home! dialogue is abnormal.
  • Fixed an where New Name Auction character name filter drop down menu is blocked by character name listing.
  • Fixed an where defeating Normal Limbo counts as Normal Carling defeated in CASER In-depth Investigation.
  • Fixed an where Demon Slayer/Demon Avenger's Echo of Hero tooltip does not show HP cost.
  • Fixed an where 2024 Thank You!'s Normal Monster Damage bonus effect is incorrectly applied.
  • Fixed an where My Home related check list in CHASER Special Investigation cannot be progressed.
  • Fixed an where Visit My Home button in other character's Character Info is not working as intended.
  • Fixed an where certain Mage Specter monster's name contains inconsistency.
  • Fixed an where Additional Potential filter in Maple Auction does not return any result.



    • By-Design Issues


  • Label Ring of the Source is not replicated by Synchroid is intended by design.
    •  ↪ Animated label ring will not be copied by Synchroid.



    - MapleSEA Administrator
     

    国际服冒险岛公告


    Champion Burning Event


    Double it and give it to the next person? Let’s take it further - double the rewards for not just one but two characters at once! Set one character as your Leader and benefit two other characters at the same time, tripling the EXP you're earning overall and earning special rewards from the Champion Burning Coin Shop as well, featuring a selection of items to help your boosted characters keep their gear in top shape!

    Champion Burning Double Up

    • PST/PDT (UTC -8/-7): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, March 18, 2025 4:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, March 19, 2025 12:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, March 19, 2025 10:59 AM

    Event Details:

    • Requirements: Lv. 101 and above characters who have completed the ‘[Champion Burning] Your Champion and Mine’ quest (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).
    • Select ‘Champion Burning’ from the Event List and click ‘Participate’ to start the Champion Burning Double Up event.
      • Alternatively, accept the ‘[Champion Burning] Your Champion and Mine’ quest by talking to Dame Appropriation.
    • Participation is limited to one world per account, so choose wisely!

    Designating Characters:

    • Open the Champion Burning UI and press the ‘Designate’ button.
    • The first Champion designated becomes the Leader, and 2 other characters can be designated as Champions.
      • The Leader can be changed once a week from your designated Champions.
      • When switching Leaders, any unused Double Up EXP Points from the current Leader will be lost.

    • Once designated, there will be a visual effect where Champions are following the Leader. The effect activates automatically when changing maps or logging back in.
      • This effect can be toggled on/off through the Skills UI in the Beginner’s tab.

    Note: If the Leader has World Leaped, a different character can be designated as the Leader in Burning World to participate in the event again.

    Double Up EXP Points:

    • When the Leader defeats monsters near their level (20 levels below and 20 levels above), the other Champions receive 1 Double Up EXP Point for every monster defeated.
      • Monster defeats only count when in a solo party or not in a party at all.
      • Monster defeats will count when summoning monsters with VIP Booster.
    • Double Up EXP Points are evenly distributed among the Champions, with a weekly cap of 100,000 points.
    • Log in as each Champion to claim and use the earned EXP points.
      • Double Up EXP Points can be used on Mega Burning, Tera Burning, and Hyper Burning characters.

    Note: If the Leader has World Leaped and the remaining Champions in Burning World are not transferred, those Champions cannot use Double Up EXP Points or access the Double Up Coin Shop.

    Double Up Coins:

    • The Leader can complete Double Up check-ins to earn Double Up Coins by defeating 2,000 monsters near their level (20 levels above or 20 levels below).
      • Check-in 3 times a week, up to a total of 24 times.
      • Only the Leader can click the ‘Claim’ check-in button.
      • Monster defeats only count when in a solo party or not in a party at all.
    • For each check-in, all Champions receive 2,500 Double Up Coins.
      • Coins and purchases in the Double Up Coin Shop are saved for existing Champions but are not shared among characters.
    • Spend 3,000 Maple Points to use a Double Up Pass for missed check-in days.
      • All Champions will receive 2,500 Double Up Coins, for each Double Up Pass used.

    Note: Double Up EXP Points and Double Up Check-in weekly records reset every Thursday at 12:00 AM UTC.

    Champion Burning Double Up Coin Shop

    • PST/PDT (UTC -8/-7): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, March 18, 2025 4:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, March 19, 2025 12:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, March 19, 2025 10:59 AM

    Event Details:

    • Open the Champion Burning UI and press the ‘Open Shop’ button to open the shop.
    • Requirements: Lv. 101 and above characters designated as Champion (Zero characters that completed Story Quest Act 2).
    • Double Up Coins are specific to each Champion character and the quantity limit for items are limited to individual purchases per character. The quantity limit isn’t shared with all Champions together; it is instead applied for each individual Champion character.

    Double Up Coin Shop

    The Dark Ride Bounty Event


    The Ride or Die Event is coming to a close soon, but before it does we're putting out a bounty on some of the bosses under Kazax's sway! Over the next four weeks, Maplers in North America can defeat the target and qualify for a chance at receiving the bounty payout, including a real-world bag of MapleStory merch plus in-game rewards!

    Event Details:

    • Join the Ride Or Die Event and take down the bounty for your chance at the prizes!
    • Requirements: Must be participating in The Dark Ride: Ride or Die Event, and must be living in North America (excluding Hawaii, Alaska, and Quebec) to receive prizes.
    • Each week, new bounties will be placed on bosses in the Ride or Die Event.
      • This Week's Bounty Target: Zakum - January 14, 2025 4:00 PM PST (UTC -8) - January 20, 2025 3:59 PM PST (UTC -8)
    • Qualifying players who defeat a Bounty Target and submit a screenshot of their victory screen to The Dark Ride Bounty Event Entry channel on the official MapleStory Discord will have a chance to receive the prizes for that week.
    • Once selected and confirmed, winners will be announced in this post.
    • Full rules for this event are available here.

    Event Rewards:

    • Week 1: Zakum - 5 Winners
      • Pink Bean Tumbler Key Chain
      • Yeti Spa Headband
      • Pink Bean Apron
      • 5,000 Maple Points
      • 3x EXP Coupon (15 min) (5)
      • Yeti Chat Emoticon Coupon (coupon has a 90-day duration, emoticons are permanent once redeemed).
    • Week 2: To Be Announced - 5 Winners
      • Yeti Tumbler Key Chain
      • Pink Bean Spa Headband
      • Orange Mushroom Apron
      • 5,000 Maple Points
      • 3x EXP Coupon (15 min) (5)
      • Yeti Chat Emoticon Coupon (coupon has a 90-day duration, emoticons are permanent once redeemed).
    • Week 3: To Be Announced - 10 Winners
      • King Pepe Drawstring Bag
      • Green Slime Spa Headband
      • Pink Bean Phone Pop Grip
      • Acrylic Magnetic Keychain Holder
      • 5,000 Maple Points
      • 3x EXP Coupon (15 min) (5)
      • Yeti Chat Emoticon Coupon (coupon has a 90-day duration, emoticons are permanent once redeemed).
    • Week 4: To Be Announced - 10 Winners
      • Yeti Phone Pop Grip
      • MapleStory Fan
      • Rock Spirit Strap Keychain
      • Wireless Charger + Mood Light
      • 5,000 Maple Points
      • 3x EXP Coupon (15 min) (5)
      • Yeti Chat Emoticon Coupon (coupon has a 90-day duration, emoticons are permanent once redeemed).

    Winners:

    • To Be Announced!

    Cash Shop Update for January 1


    Winter Surprise Style Box

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 1, 2025 12:00 AM - Tuesday, January 7, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 1, 2025 9:00 AM - Wednesday, January 8, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, January 1, 2025 7:00 PM - Wednesday, January 8, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Winter Surprise Style Box
      • Price (1): 3,400 NX
      • Price (11): 34,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Check out some of the most recent additions to the Winter Surprise Style Box.

    Svenn: Star Goggles, Blue Drop (M), Starry Belle Boots, Ice Snowboard, Bear-fluencer, and Snow Earrings.
    Blindi: Star Goggles, White Drop (F), Starry Belle Boots, Ice Snowboard, Bear-fluencer, and Snow Earrings.

    Lani: Stylish White Winter Hat, Stylish White Winter Knit, Snowy Frost Broomstick, Carrot on My Nose, Snow Day Dream Label Ring, and Snow Day Dream Word Bubble Ring.
    Rocko: Stylish Black Winter Hat, Stylish Black Winter Knit, Snowy Frost Broomstick, Carrot on My Nose, Snow Day Dream Label Ring, and Snow Day Dream Word Bubble Ring.

    Clive: Snowman Weapon, Cozy Fur Hat , Cozy Fur Outfit, Cozy Fur Shoes, Winter Wings, and Ice Cold Red.
    Miranna: Polar Bear Hood, Polar Fur-Trimmed Dress, Polar Booties, Angelic Polar Cape, Arctic Narwhal Pillow, and Ice Cold Red.

    Sali: Winter Rabbit Bracelet, Red Festive Gumball, Christmas Padded Jacket, and Winter Wand.
    Fria: Happy Bear Blue Hat, Happy Bear Blue Hoodie, Winter Rabbit Bracelet, and Ice Flower.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    In Interactive worlds, you can trade these style box items with other players through the Cash Item Trade window, if you haven't equipped them. Right-click on a character to see the menu and click on 'Trade Cash Item' button to trade unequipped PSSB items.

    You can also exchange them with Ari, located near the Free Market entrance, and receive a Style Box Stamp. You can receive one stamp per item. This stamp is permanent and untradeable. When you collect enough stamps, you can talk to Shiro, also located near the Free Market entrance, to exchange the stamps for a permanent equip item of your choice! PSSB items obtained in the Netherlands cannot be traded outside of the account, but can be traded within the account and be exchanged for Style Box stamps.

    Royal Style Coupons

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 1, 2025 12:00 AM - Tuesday, January 21, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 1, 2025 9:00 AM - Wednesday, January 22, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, January 1, 2025 7:00 PM - Wednesday, January 22, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Royal Hair Coupon
      • Price: 3,300 NX
      • Duration: 90 days
    • Royal Face Coupon
      • Price: 3,300 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Male Hairstyles available now, left to right: Fresh Breeze Hair (NEW!), Cute Boy Hair, Eckhart Hair, Ice King Hair, Namo Hair, and Troubadour Hair.

    Female Hairstyles available now, left to right: Glistening Dew Hair (NEW!), Chloe Doll Hair, Kid Next Door Hair, Princess Ponytail Hair, Scraggly Locks, and Soprano Hair.

    Male Face Styles available now, left to right: Althea Face (NEW!), Cool Future Face (NEW!), Baby Face, Gleaming Cutie Face, Jaded Doll Face, and Serious Face.

    Female Face Styles available now, left to right: Althea Face (NEW!), Cool Future Face (NEW!), Baby Face, Jaded Doll Face, Serious Face, and Sparkling Sweeheart Face.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    DAILY DEALS

    Discounted Platinum Scissors of Karma

    • PST (UTC -8): Saturday, January 4, 2025 12:00 AM - Sunday, January 5, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Saturday, January 4, 2025 9:00 AM - Monday, January 6, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Saturday, January 4, 2025 7:00 PM - Monday, January 6, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in Interactive worlds only:

    • Platinum Scissors of Karma
      • Price: 4,000 NX 2,400 NX
      • Duration: 7 Days

    Join the discussion on the Official MapleStory Discord or the Official MapleStory Forums!

    ONGOING SALES

    Premium Surprise Style Box

    • PST (UTC -8): Tuesday, December 17, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, January 14, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Tuesday, December 17, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, January 15, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +10): Tuesday, December 17, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, January 15, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Premium Surprise Style Box
      • Price (1): 3,400 NX
      • Price (11): 34,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Check out some of the most recent additions to the Premium Surprise Style Box.

    Rocko: Snowflake Ribbon, Snow Dancer (M), Dancing Ice, Ice Crystal, and Ice Melody.
    Miranna: Snowflake Ribbon, Winter Dancer (F), Dancing Ice, Ice Crystal, and Ice Melody.

    Blindi: Cyber Street Punk Beanie White, Cyber Street Punk Hood White, Cyber Street Punk Anklet, Cyber Street Punk Neon, and Cyber Street Punk Black Cat.
    Fria: Cyber Street Punk Beanie Black, Cyber Street Punk Hood Black, Cyber Street Punk Anklet, Cyber Street Punk Neon, and Cyber Street Punk Black Cat.

    Clive: Future Inner Circle, Future Secret (M), First Contact, Hyper Space, and Hyper Tachion.
    Miranna: Future Domination, Future Spirit (F), First Contact, Hyper Space, and Hyper Tachion.

    Blindi: Arcana Ornament Hat, Dawn Arcana Dress, Dawn Arcana Shoes, Dusk and Dawn Tarot Card, and Dusk and Dawn Longsword.
    Fria: Arcana Ball Mask, Dusk Arcana Suit, Dusk Arcana Shoes, Dusk and Dawn Tarot Card, and Dusk and Dawn Longsword.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    In Interactive worlds, you can trade these style box items with other players through the Cash Item Trade window, if you haven't equipped them. Right-click on a character to see the menu and click on 'Trade Cash Item' button to trade unequipped PSSB items.

    You can also exchange them with Ari, located near the Free Market entrance, and receive a Style Box Stamp. You can receive one stamp per item. This stamp is permanent and untradeable. When you collect enough stamps, you can talk to Shiro, also located near the Free Market entrance, to exchange the stamps for a permanent equip item of your choice! PSSB items obtained in the Netherlands cannot be traded outside of the account, but can be traded within the account and be exchanged for Style Box Stamps.

    Gachapon Update

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, December 4, 2024 11:30 AM - Wednesday, January 8, 2025 11:29 AM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, December 4, 2024 8:30 PM - Wednesday, January 8, 2025 8:29 PM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Thursday, December 5, 2024 6:30 AM - Thursday, January 9, 2025 6:29 AM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Gachapon Ticket
      • Price (1): 1,000 NX
      • Price (11): 10,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Note: Gachapon update may take around 10 minutes before or after the scheduled rotation at 11:30 AM PST / 8:30 PM CET / 6:30 AM AEDT. Please refrain from using your Gachapon ticket during this time to ensure you receive items from the new rotation.

    Gachapon Tickets can give you a number of items, including chairs, mounts, damage skins, and other items. There are also unique items you can only get depending on if you're in a Heroic or an Interactive world. Look below to see some of the items currently available from the Gachapon Ticket.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    New Chairs

    Take a load off with these new chairs!

    Snow Festival Mushroom Chair, Maplemas Tree Panel Chair, and False Happiness Chair

    New Mount

    This brand-new mount is available as a permanent version!

    Penguin Slide Mount

    New Chat Emoticons

    Collect these new emoticons to use with your friends in the Maple Chat window!

    • Baby Lotus's Aspirations Chat Emoticon (Waaah)
    • Baby Lotus's Aspirations Chat Emoticon (So Very Sleepy)
    • Baby Lotus's Aspirations Chat Emoticon (Flutter)
    • Baby Lotus's Aspirations Chat Emoticon (Run Away)
    • Baby Lotus's Aspirations Chat Emoticon (Gauge Filling Up)

    New Damage Skin

    Attack your enemies in style with the following new damage skin!

    • Snow Angel Damage Skin

    SALES ENDING THIS WEEK

    Christmas Royal Style Coupons

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, December 25, 2024 12:00 AM - Tuesday, December 31, 2024 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, December 25, 2024 9:00 AM - Wednesday, January 1, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, December 25, 2024 7:00 PM - Wednesday, January 1, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Christmas Royal Hair Coupon
      • Price: 3,300 NX
      • Duration: 90 days
    • Christmas Royal Face Coupon
      • Price: 3,300 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    [Updated] Scheduled Maintenance - January 15, 2025


    [Updated at 7:49 AM PDT] The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 3 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

    We will be performing a scheduled maintenance Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 5:00 AM PST (8:00 AM EST / 2:00 PM CET / 12:00 AM AEDT January 16). [Updated 1/14/2025] We anticipate the maintenance to last approximately 3 hours, concluding around 8:00 AM PST (11:00 AM EST / 5:00 PM CET / 3:00 AM AEDT January 16).

    Times:

    Wednesday, January 15, 2025
    PST (UTC -8): 5:00 AM - 8:00 AM
    EST (UTC -5): 8:00 AM - 11:00 AM
    CET (UTC +1): 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM
    AEDT (UTC +11): 12:00 AM - 3:00 AM (January 16)

    • What will be unavailable:
      • All MapleStory game servers.
    • Changes and Updates (Additional Changes TBA):
      • Opening of new events:
        • Champion Burning Double Up
        • Extradimensional Visitors Events
        • New Name Auction

    Cash Shop Update for January 15


    Premium Surprise Style Box

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 12:00 AM - Tuesday, February 18, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 9:00 AM - Wednesday, February 19, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +10): Wednesday, January 15, 2025 7:00 PM - Wednesday, February 19, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Premium Surprise Style Box
      • Price (1): 3,400 NX
      • Price (11): 34,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Check out some of the most recent additions to the Premium Surprise Style Box.

    Fria: Glacial Horns, Glacial Armor, Glacial Icewalkers, Glacial Spear, and Glacial Flower.
    Sali: Glacial Tiara, Glacial Dress, Glacial Snowdancers, Glacial Spear, and Glacial Flower.

    Miranna: Long Shadows, Light Opposite Memory (F), Lonely Steps (F), One Night Mirage, and Althea's Weapon.
    Clive: Looming Darkness, Light Beyond Memory (M), Gloomy Steps (M), One Night Mirage, and Lonely Flapping.

    Rocko: Snowflake Ribbon, Snow Dancer (M), Dancing Ice, Ice Crystal, and Ice Melody.
    Miranna: Snowflake Ribbon, Winter Dancer (F), Dancing Ice, Ice Crystal, and Ice Melody.

    Blindi: Cyber Street Punk Beanie White, Cyber Street Punk Hood White, Cyber Street Punk Anklet, Cyber Street Punk Neon, and Cyber Street Punk Black Cat.
    Fria: Cyber Street Punk Beanie Black, Cyber Street Punk Hood Black, Cyber Street Punk Anklet, Cyber Street Punk Neon, and Cyber Street Punk Black Cat.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    In Interactive worlds, you can trade these style box items with other players through the Cash Item Trade window, if you haven't equipped them. Right-click on a character to see the menu and click on 'Trade Cash Item' button to trade unequipped PSSB items.

    You can also exchange them with Ari, located near the Free Market entrance, and receive a Style Box Stamp. You can receive one stamp per item. This stamp is permanent and untradeable. When you collect enough stamps, you can talk to Shiro, also located near the Free Market entrance, to exchange the stamps for a permanent equip item of your choice! PSSB items obtained in the Netherlands cannot be traded outside of the account, but can be traded within the account and be exchanged for Style Box Stamps.

    Cygnus Knight and Hero Hair Coupons

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 12:00 AM - Tuesday, February 4, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 9:00 AM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 7:00 PM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in all worlds in Cygnus Knight and Hero Packages. Please note that these coupons are not available for direct purchase, and are only available in the various Cygnus Knight and Hero Packages:

    Each Cygnus Knight Package contains a Cygnus Knight Hair Coupon that can be used to pick a Cygnus Knight hairstyle of your choice.

    Male Cygnus Knight Hairstyles available, left to right:

    • Chief Knight Mihile Hair, Chief Knight Oz Hair, Chief Knight Irena Hair, Chief Knight Eckhart Hair, Chief Knight Hawkeye Hair, and Tactician Neinheart Hair;
    • Dawn Warrior Knight Hair, Blaze Wizard Knight Hair, Wind Archer Knight Hair, Night Walker Knight Hair, and Thunder Breaker Knight Hair.

    Female Cygnus Knight Hairstyles available, left to right:

    • Chief Knight Oz Hair, Chief Knight Irena Hair, Chief Knight Eckhart Hair, Chief Knight Hawkeye Hair, and Empress Cygnus Hair;
    • Dawn Warrior Knight Hair, Blaze Wizard Knight Hair, Wind Archer Knight Hair, Night Walker Knight Hair, and Thunder Breaker Knight Hair.

    Similarly, each Hero Package contains a Hero Hair Coupon that can be used to pick a Hero hairstyle of your choice.

    Male Hero Hairstyles available, left to right: Aran's Heroic Hairdo, Shade's Heroic Hairdo, Evan's Heroic Hairdo, Luminous's Heroic Hairdo, Mercedes's Heroic Hairdo, and Phantom's Heroic Hairdo.

    Female Hero Hairstyles available, left to right: Aran's Heroic Hairdo, Shade's Heroic Hairdo, Evan's Heroic Hairdo, Luminous's Heroic Hairdo, Mercedes's Heroic Hairdo, and Phantom's Heroic Hairdo .

    Gachapon Update

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 11:30 AM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 11:29 AM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 8:30 PM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 8:29 PM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Thursday, January 9, 2025 6:30 AM - Thursday, February 6, 2025 6:29 AM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Gachapon Ticket
      • Price (1): 1,000 NX
      • Price (11): 10,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Note: Gachapon update may take around 10 minutes before or after the scheduled rotation at 11:30 AM PST / 8:30 PM CET / 6:30 AM AEDT. Please refrain from using your Gachapon ticket during this time to ensure you receive items from the new rotation.

    Gachapon Tickets can give you a number of items, including chairs, mounts, damage skins, and other items. There are also unique items you can only get depending on if you're in a Heroic or an Interactive world. Look below to see some of the items currently available from the Gachapon Ticket.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    New Chairs

    Take a load off with these new chairs!

    Ice Dancing Rink, Manic Dancer Limbo Chair, and True Power Snake Chair

    New Mount

    This brand-new mount is available as a permanent version!

    Cobra Mount

    New Damage Skin

    Attack your enemies in style with the following new damage skin!

    • Bellamoa Damage Skin (Unit)

    New Magical Scroll

    Empower your equipment with a newly added Magical Scroll for Interactive worlds only!

    • Magical Scroll for Magic ATT for Two-Handed Weapons: 100% Success Rate, +3 STR/DEX/INT/LUK, +9-11 Magic ATT.

    Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 12:00 AM - Tuesday, February 4, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 9:00 AM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 7:00 PM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in Interactive worlds only:

    • Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry
      • Price (1): 4,000 NX
      • Price (10): 36,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    See all the rewards rates for this item here.

    Open Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry (available exclusively in Interactive worlds) to obtain one random 90-day pet or some pet-related consumables! Take home the Winter Deer, Snow Ram, and Winter Snowy pets and summon them to obtain the Winter Melody skill, which will increase your Weapon Attack and Magic Attack.

    Note: The Winter Snowy pet currently has the incorrect in-game name of "Winter Snow" pet. This will be corrected soon in an upcoming update.

    You can also receive the Honey Lionet, Jet Lionet, Pearl Lionet, Tubby Tiger, and Melting Bear pets! Summon the Honey Lionet, Jet Lionet, and Pearl Lionet pets to obtain the Lionet Trio's Mysterious Power skill, which will increase your Weapon Attack and Magic Attack.

    You can also get a stack of 10 Organic Wondercookies or Concentrated Premium Water of Life!

    Luna Crystal

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 12:00 AM - Tuesday, February 4, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 9:00 AM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 7:00 PM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in Interactive worlds only:

    • Luna Crystal
      • Price (1): 3,900 NX
      • Duration: Permanent

    See all the rewards rates for this item here.

    Use the Luna Crystal (available exclusively in Interactive worlds) on a pair of Wonderberry pets to create a stronger buddy to help you out! By combining pets you get from Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry or the Luna Crystal, you can get higher quality and more powerful 90-day pets!

    Use two Wonder Black pets, which can be obtained from Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, and receive either:

    • A Sweet Luna quality Winter Deer, Snow Ram, Winter Snowy, Power XO Bun, Super XO Bun, Magic XO Bun, Baby Hippo, Wolf Pup, and Lion Cub 90-day pet.
    • A chance at a Petite Luna quality Florian, Florence, and Lil Flora 90-day pet.
    • Or the permanent Luna Crystal Key Pet Equipment, which can be used by any of the Petite Luna pets and give the appearance of their normal Pet Equipment!

    You can also combine a Wonder Black and Sweet Luna pet together and receive either:

    • A Dream Luna quality Winter Deer, Snow Ram, Winter Snow, Power XO Bun, Super XO Bun, Magic XO Bun, Baby Hippo, Wolf Pup, and Lion Cub 90-day pet.
    • Better chances at a Petite Luna quality Florian, Florence, and Lil Flora 90-day pet.
    • Or the permanent Luna Crystal Key Pet Equipment!

    Note: The Winter Snowy pet currently has the incorrect in-game name of "Winter Snow" pet. This will be corrected soon in an upcoming update.

    Different quality pets grant different stat boosting skills when equipped as a set, instead of their normal pet set sklls:

    • Sweet Luna (Sweet Luna Skill): 1 pet grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +6. 2 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +14. 3 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +24.
    • Dream Luna (Dream Luna Skill): 1 pet grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +7. 2 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +16. 3 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +27.
    • Petite Luna (Butterfly Garden Skill): Comes with a Meso Magnet skill with a larger area of effect than normal. 1 pet grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +8. 2 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +18. 3 pets grants Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +36 and increased item pickup range.

    Limited Time Wonderberry and Luna Crystal Pet Equipment

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 12:00 AM - Tuesday, February 4, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 9:00 AM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, January 8, 2025 7:00 PM - Wednesday, February 5, 2025 6:59 PM

    Note: The Winter Snowy pet currently has the incorrect in-game name of "Winter Snow" pet. This will be corrected soon in an upcoming update.

    SALES ENDING THIS WEEK

    Premium Surprise Style Box

    • PST (UTC -8): Tuesday, December 17, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, January 14, 2025 11:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Tuesday, December 17, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, January 15, 2025 8:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +10): Tuesday, December 17, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, January 15, 2025 6:59 PM

    Available in all worlds:

    • Premium Surprise Style Box
      • Price (1): 3,400 NX
      • Price (11): 34,000 NX
      • Duration: 90 days

    Check out some of the most recent additions to the Premium Surprise Style Box.

    Rocko: Snowflake Ribbon, Snow Dancer (M), Dancing Ice, Ice Crystal, and Ice Melody.
    Miranna: Snowflake Ribbon, Winter Dancer (F), Dancing Ice, Ice Crystal, and Ice Melody.

    Blindi: Cyber Street Punk Beanie White, Cyber Street Punk Hood White, Cyber Street Punk Anklet, Cyber Street Punk Neon, and Cyber Street Punk Black Cat.
    Fria: Cyber Street Punk Beanie Black, Cyber Street Punk Hood Black, Cyber Street Punk Anklet, Cyber Street Punk Neon, and Cyber Street Punk Black Cat.

    Clive: Future Inner Circle, Future Secret (M), First Contact, Hyper Space, and Hyper Tachion.
    Miranna: Future Domination, Future Spirit (F), First Contact, Hyper Space, and Hyper Tachion.

    Blindi: Arcana Ornament Hat, Dawn Arcana Dress, Dawn Arcana Shoes, Dusk and Dawn Tarot Card, and Dusk and Dawn Longsword.
    Fria: Arcana Ball Mask, Dusk Arcana Suit, Dusk Arcana Shoes, Dusk and Dawn Tarot Card, and Dusk and Dawn Longsword.

    See all the reward rates for this item here.

    In Interactive worlds, you can trade these style box items with other players through the Cash Item Trade window, if you haven't equipped them. Right-click on a character to see the menu and click on 'Trade Cash Item' button to trade unequipped PSSB items.

    You can also exchange them with Ari, located near the Free Market entrance, and receive a Style Box Stamp. You can receive one stamp per item. This stamp is permanent and untradeable. When you collect enough stamps, you can talk to Shiro, also located near the Free Market entrance, to exchange the stamps for a permanent equip item of your choice! PSSB items obtained in the Netherlands cannot be traded outside of the account, but can be traded within the account and be exchanged for Style Box Stamps.


    日服冒险岛公告


    散歩路その234


    かえでくみん ： こんにちは！そうさん、CHASERイベント楽しんでますか？
    かえでそう ： くみんさんこんちゃー！軍団長たちのドラマがたまらないですね！
    うさぎのように可愛い「あの子」のアンドロイドが欲しいので今回も頑張りますよー！
    かえでくみん ： あのアンドロイド可愛いですよね～
    そういえば、次元の亀裂の噂は聞きましたか？
    かえでそう ： 少し壊れてると噂の次元の空間ですね！一緒に見にいってみましょうか！
    そういえば、くみんさんのアバターから強そうなオーラを感じますが、それは何ですか？
    かえでくみん ： 気付きましたか？これ不思議な星の力を宿した特別なアバターなんです～ これを着ているとパワーがみなぎってきて
    あの怪しい深海も怖くないです！
    かえでそう ： 深海なのに都市のような要塞のような何が起こるかわからない謎の多いあの「アングラーカンパニー」という場所ですね！
    グランディスの７番目の地域「タラハート」も発見されたようですが、くみんさんも一緒に行ってみませんか？
    かえでくみん ： はい！一緒に行きましょう！
    そういえば最近、街でドッペルゲンガーをよく見かけるのですが、私だけですか？
    かえでそう ： あぁ！あれはきっと同一人物ですよ！
    最近、名前を新しくするのが人気みたいで、そういう方が増えてきましたねー！
    かえでくみん ： 同一人物だったんですね！私も変えてみようかな～
    あれ？今そうさんのアバターの色変わりました？
    かえでそう ： あ、気づいちゃいました？
    素敵な色でしょう？
    かえでくみん ： え？
    かえでそう ： え？えぇ！？

    ※この内容は予定であり、パッチ内容を保証するものではありません。

    台服冒险岛公告


    【超級傳播者】


    注意事項：

    1.圖片與文案僅供參考，詳細內容請依遊戲內為主。

    2.詳細道具資訊請依遊戲中內容為主，若有任何特殊異動將另行於官網公告說明。

    3.活動期間，系統若發生任何問題或其他不可抗力之因素，導致活動無法順利進行，將統一由官方依情況於網頁公佈。如因遊戲異常產生與公告內容不符的道具(包含但不限於道具功能、道具名稱，道具數量、取得方式...等)，相關道具持有權仍屬於活動主辦方，活動主辦方得逕行道具回收；或依照取得優先順序，進行道具回收。

    【魔法馬車】


    注意事項：

    1.此為機會中獎商品，消費者購買或參與活動不代表即可獲得特定商品，詳細內容請參考【機率型道具說明】。

    2.圖片與文案僅供參考，詳細內容請依遊戲內為主。

    3.詳細道具資訊請依遊戲中內容為主，若有任何特殊異動將另行於官網公告說明。

    4.活動期間，系統若發生任何問題或其他不可抗力之因素，導致活動無法順利進行，將統一由官方依情況於網頁公佈。如因遊戲異常產生與公告內容不符的道具(包含但不限於道具功能、道具名稱，道具數量、取得方式...等)，相關道具持有權仍屬於活動主辦方，活動主辦方得逕行道具回收；或依照取得優先順序，進行道具回收。

    【魔法豎琴】


    注意事項：

    1.此為機會中獎商品，消費者購買或參與活動不代表即可獲得特定商品，詳細內容請參考【機率型道具說明】。

    2.圖片與文案僅供參考，詳細內容請依遊戲內為主。

    3.詳細道具資訊請依遊戲中內容為主，若有任何特殊異動將另行於官網公告說明。

    4.活動期間，系統若發生任何問題或其他不可抗力之因素，導致活動無法順利進行，將統一由官方依情況於網頁公佈。如因遊戲異常產生與公告內容不符的道具(包含但不限於道具功能、道具名稱，道具數量、取得方式...等)，相關道具持有權仍屬於活動主辦方，活動主辦方得逕行道具回收；或依照取得優先順序，進行道具回收。

    5.部分道具Lv.300以上地區不會發動道具專用功能，Lv.300以上地區等級下調時也將持續維持限制，詳細道具資訊請依遊戲中內容為主，若有任何特殊異動將另行於官網公告說明。

    新楓之谷《0115(三)CHASER延後開機公告》


    親愛的玩家，您好：

     

    今日(01/15) 例行維護作業原定下午14:00開機，

    但維護時間超乎預期，開機時間另行公告。

     

    維護期間造成各位玩家的不便，敬請見諒。

     

    《新楓之谷》工作小組 敬上

    新楓之谷《0115(三) Chaser改版維護開機公告》


    親愛的冒險者們：

    今日01/15(三) 的維護作業已完成，全伺服器已於下午17:00開放。

    記得下周一的01/20要上線，拿泰里20周年的禮物。

     

    一、活動內容

     

    【記憶中的一頁】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18 (二)23:59

    本次V267版本的主要活動，

    上線簽到、狩獵怪物簽到，還有小遊戲、拳擊機。

    可獲得各種獎勵道具，一定要玩好玩滿。

     

    【CHASER】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/03/31 (一)23:59

    是V267~V268為期2個版本的大活動，跟著殺人鯨調查。

    有核心調查、特殊調查、深入調查，

    達成指定條件，獲得限定時裝、殺人鯨禮物、殺人鯨背景。

     

    【黃金富豪的秘密金庫】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/04 (二)23:59

    猜對金庫密碼，就可以獲得稀有的獎勵。

    P寵交換券、時裝假髮交換券、卡勒馬22星強化券(200等)、5級特殊技能戒指選擇券。

     

    【究極燃燒1+4 & 花開月影-究極燃燒1+2】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/05/13 (二)23:59

    全職業可燃燒到260的究極燃燒1+4。

    還有<狂狼/隱月>限定的花開月影-究極燃燒1+2。

    活動時間到05/13，可以慢慢練。

     

    【花開月影祕笈】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/05/13 (二)23:59

    狂狼勇士和隱月迎來Remaster，只有這2個職業才能參加的活動。

    狂狼勇士是花之卷軸，隱月是月之卷軸，

    達成指定等級，獲得豐富獎勵。

     

    【Double菇菇通行證】

    活動時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/05/13 (二)23:59

    不管新創角色還是老手，全職業都可進行，

    多了挑戰任務，打敗指定BOSS，就可獲得不錯用的裝備。

    帳號限定參加1次，沒辦法換角色，千萬要想好用哪隻角色在參加，

     

    【新BOSS - 林波，根源的暴走】

    活動時間：2025/02/05(三)維護後 ~ 2025/03/31 (一)23:59

    Lv285的新BOSS-林波，最多限定3人組隊攻略。

    活動分3種方式進行：

    1)無關難度擊敗林波。

    2)困難難度擊敗林波。

    3)若有玩家擊敗困難林波，其他玩家可以獲得一同慶祝的獎勵。

     

    【泰里的20週年禮物】

    活動時間：2025/01/20(一)00:00 ~ 2025/12/20 (六)23:59

    2025年是楓之谷在台的20周年，

    而在每月的20號，可和泰里獲得獎勵，

    千萬千萬要記得在20號領獎勵呀。

     

    【春節活動 & 我的小屋-春節】

    活動時間：2025/01/22(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/04 (二)23:59

    今年是蛇年，狩獵怪物進行簽到拿紅包，開紅包拿春節硬幣買道具。

    且在01/29初一當天，有特別的累積上線時數活動，

    有機會獲得幸運紅心，並祝大家新年快樂。

     

    【燃燒特快車】

    活動時間：2025/01/22(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18 (二)23:59

    狩獵怪物進行簽到，

    有EXP券、249水可以拿，要輕鬆練分身要記得拿好拿滿。


     

    二、商城更新

     

    【魔法馬車】NEW!!

    販售時間：2025/01/15(三)維護後 ~ 2025/01/29(三)07:59
    新椅子<純潔玫瑰情侶、蛇的真正力量、吹笛蛇、寶藏船椅子>

    新騎寵<眼鏡蛇、冰霜貓頭應騎寵>。

     

    【魔法豎琴】NEW!!

    販售時間：2025/01/15(三)維護後 ~ 2025/01/29(三)07:59
    抽武公順便敲滅龍。

    滅龍盔甲相關任務要去技術村找NPC接。

     

    【超級傳播者】NEW!!

    販售時間：2025/01/15(三)維護後 ~ 2025/01/22(三)07:59
    有機會獲得雙排傳說內潛的傳播者，

    限時1周販售。

     

    【黃金蘋果 – 輪迴碑石】

    販售時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/01/22(三)07:59
    輪迴碑石和漆黑BOSS碎片，

    蘋果椅子<不朽的循環>、字型<老舊的羊皮紙(Unit)>。

    還有v267~v268限定推出的AUT6區交換券，40個碎片換60個AUT。

     

    【時尚隨機箱 – 記憶行者＆時髦風格】

    販售時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/01/22(三)07:59

    藍白金色系的記憶行者時裝，

    黑白色系的時髦風格時裝。

     

    【皇家美容美髮 – 海王星＆土星＆眼淚爆發倒數臉型】

    販售時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/01/21(二)23:59
    比克‧艾德華為新楓之谷的民眾帶來超人氣的髮型和臉型！！

    海王星＆土星＆眼淚爆發倒數臉型登場，走過路過千萬不要錯過！！

     

    【萌獸卡牌包 – 卡爾西溫&小蘭&瑪哈】

    販售時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18(二)23:59
    除了卡爾西溫的怪物們，

    還有小蘭、瑪哈。

    殺人鯨特殊萌獸依舊還在裡面。

     

    【寵物隨機箱 – 記錄的寵物們】

    販售時間：2025/01/08(三)維護後 ~ 2025/02/18(二)23:59

    記錄魔法圖書、記錄古老圖書、記錄羊皮紙，

    他們都是W寵。


     

    三、遊戲說明

    1. 官方人員不會透過遊戲內來與玩家通知中獎訊息，更不會於官網主動要求玩家輸入帳號密碼，請各位玩家不要前往來路不明的網址，以免帳號陷入盜客的風險中，bf帳號務必要綁定bf!APP並設定最高防護，才能獲得完善的防盜保護。

    2. 請勿購買來路不明的點數以及商城道具，保障自身權益。

    3. 楓幣商城、拍賣場、現金道具交換、宅配功能必須要創建超過3天且等級達到61等級以上才可使用；商城送禮則是需要創建超過7天和等級61等以上。

    4. 常態維持艾麗亞伺服器限制創角，若艾麗亞伺服器沒有任何一隻角色，將會被限制新創角色。(但可以透過移民移入艾麗亞來解除限制)

    5. CHASER事前預約獎勵，置獎時間：01/15 維護後 ~ 01/28 23:59止。(必須是有參與事前預約的角色)。

    6. 01/08臨時維護的補償，置獎時間：01/15 維護後 ~ 01/28 23:59止。(必須是01/07 23:59 前創立的角色)

    7. 01/08&01/12的伺服器回溯的處理進度說明：由於客訴進件量較多，調查與補發可能會花費較長時間，尤其是有強化素質的裝備，需要更長的時間，還請玩家耐心等候處理。


     

    四、已知問題

    1. 在聖克梅勒茲進行貿易時，怪物會異常生成在船下方(圖層後)的問題。

    2. 稀有附加潛能的UI，顯示韓文的問題。

    3. 刪除角色時，異常顯示<使用OTP可上刪除>的訊息。

    4. 角色穿戴動態名牌戒指時，複製人機器人未能複製動態名牌戒指的問題。

    5. 動態名牌戒指顯示掉幀的問題。

     

    五、修正問題

    1.. 職業<劍豪>無法使用楓幣重製公會技能的問題。

    2. 神之子的蓓塔，未套用師徒優惠效果的問題。

    3. 6轉的惡魔復仇者使用菇菇通行證的部分獎勵裝備箱子，錯誤的獲得str潛能的裝備。

    4. 無法使用瞬移石，飛進飛出菇菇神社的問題。

    5. 夜光V核心只有2個強化技能的問題。

    6. 恢復部分玩家的師徒內功、硬幣，會異常超過目前正常進度的問題。

    7. 檢視他人個人資料時，錯誤的顯示<拜訪我的小屋>，應為<組隊邀請>。

    8. 添加超級燃燒加速器的道具注意事項敘述。

    10. 時裝<大家的任務帽子>異常無法點擊使用的問題。

    11. 刪除燃燒角色發生遊戲閃退的問題。

    12. 再次修正部分玩家，因為伺服器回溯導致師徒顯示不明錯誤的問題，受影響的玩家請先使用其他6轉角色進行師徒起始任務。
